document.full_text: venezuela's socialist president hugo chavez on monday announced a big increase in minimum wages and pensions in an attempt to compensate for rising living costs ahead of next year's presidential election.
document.title: hugo chavez orders big minimum wage hike
lines_and_colors: venezuela's socialist president hugo chavez on monday announced a big increase in minimum wages and pensions in an attempt to compensate for rising living costs ahead of next year's presidential election.
